ovdesc.p: This screen is used to define account tokens to be used in posting lines in the payments hub.
The accounts tokens refer to payment related accounts to be debited or credited as part of posting lines. The account could be the main debit, main credit, charges account, and P&L account.
A record authorised in the screen will create or amend or delete a record in PPT.ACCOUNTTOKEN.

desc.p: Specifies the name of the account token to be used across the payments hub.
Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
